SCAN_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE.message:
Script was able to scan all the months, but December.
Old Facebook api is used to scan December, please change Facebook language to English (UK), English (US), Русский, Українська or עברית, and scan again.
SCAN_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE.description: Description in case facebook language is not supported

SCAN_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE_LINK.description: Facebook settings page with language set.

SCAN_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE_TITLE.description: Button to facebook settings page title.
